Reviews.Title: Security camera/microphone transformer
Reviews.Author: Old Man
Reviews.Content: Very solidly built. No noise generated (a lesser transformer generated noise that could be "seen" in the video from the security camera). The fact that it is also a dual transformer (24vac and 12vdc) is a big plus since it means that one unit replaces two.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: De_Hunter
Reviews.Content: This product works well.  I am using the 24VAC output for one of my CCTV cameras.  I took a while before I submitted the review to make sure that the unit is working well.  Results:- NO compliants. Works well.I am just curious if I can use both the 12vdc output for aonther Camera at the same time.  Have not tested that as yet.I would easily reccommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect power supply for smaller security systems with mixed voltage needs(12vdc/24vac)
Reviews.Author: Michael L
Reviews.Content: I bought this for testing and diagnosing components of our surveillance system which use a variety of 12vdc and 24vac power inputs. With this I can setup a test area much easier and less cluttered and have plenty of output to power multiple devices

Reviews.Title: CCTV power supply
Reviews.Author: AC500Driver
Reviews.Content: One of our power supplies for our CCTV security system bit the dust with no warning. We shopped around locally with no luck and turned to Amazon and found this one. It's been up and running for months with no problems.
